title: CIP Lounge Facility
author: HBL
summary: The CIP Lounge Facility document provides information on complimentary access to CIP lounges for HBL Platinum and Gold Credit Cardholders at major international airports in Pakistan. The lounges are available for international flights only, and Platinum cardholders can bring one guest at no extra cost. The service is provided by third-party vendors, and HBL does not guarantee these services. The document highlights the benefits of the lounges, offering a peaceful and relaxing environment for travelers, along with contact details for further inquiries.
